resources.string: "- Bug fixed : Save/Save As crash on some phone \n - Added option to disable autosave on existing files \n"
"- Added the Auto Save feature \n - fixed the bug with Search case \n"

"- Adapted for Ice Cream Sandwich 
 - Improved the Undo option (bugs with suggestions) 
 - Added a Home Screen Widgets (shortcut to favorite files)
 - Added option to open a file by default when starting Ted
 - New Graphics (all made by myself ^^)"
"- Added an undo option (check the settings)\n - Added some performance tweaks"
"- Fixed the scroll bug since last update\n - fixed the fling options in the settings (option was always active)"

"- Fixed the crash at start caused by the last update
 - Added Fling to Scroll (launches the scroll to navigate in large files)
 - Display the active line
 - Added new color theme (ask for more if needed)"

"- Brand new release version
 - Supports multiple encoding (including UTF-8)
 - Prevent data loss when saving really big files (note that Ted is not meant to open big files though)
 - Added new color theme (ask for more if needed)
 - Replaced the autosave with a warning and popup (prevent saving unwanted changes)"
"- Bug fixed : severall crash on start\n - Added a search tool\n - Ted is listed when opening html, rss, css, php and xml files from any file browser (ask for other types if needed)"
"- Automatic save can be disabled in the settings"

"- App can be installed on the SD Card (on Android 2.2)
 - Automatic detection of end of line in opened files, possibility to define a default end of line for new files
 - Bigger dialog boxes
 - Bug fixed when openning big files"
"- Possibility to change text size in the settings. \n - Possibility to open read-only text files from other location than the SD card \n - Added a backup function for unsaved text "
"- Bug fixed while opening some files\n - New Graphics"

"- Remembers the files opened recently (number of recent files can be changed)\n - display lines numbers (can be changed in the settings)\n - automatically break lines to keep a width of one page (can be changed in the settings)"
"- Bug fixed : crash when trying to open online files"
"- Open existing files \n- Save and save as"
